content.rendered:
Air Tanzania Company Limited (ATCL) is the flag carrier airline of Tanzania based in Dar es Salaam with its hub at Julius Nyerere International Airport. It was established as Air Tanzania Corporation (ATC) in 1977 after the dissolution of East African Airways and has been a member of the African Airlines Association since its inception.

 

View Air Tanzania Hand / Cabin | Checked Baggage Allowance and Excess Baggage rates in the below link

 Air Tanzania Checked Baggage

Air Tanzania Excess Baggage

Air Tanzania Global Hand | Cabin Baggage

 Air Tanzania  Offices Worldwide

Find  Air Tanzania  Reservation | Town | Sales | Airport Offices Contact details such as Address, Phone number, Location, Email and more details in your country
